author: Khwezi1306
title: Good and convenient overnight stay
text:
I stayed here for one night whilst en-route to a venue outside London the next day. It was important for me to have a hotel close to Waterloo Station for my early morning travels.
This hotel's easy and quick access to the tube was the big driver, and I found it perfect for what I wanted. The staff were very welcoming and efficient in both check-in and checkout. Whilst the breakfast in this hotel is quite good, the dinner restaurant, which includes a bar, is not something i could write home about. For dinner, I would suggest any of the restaurants close by some of which are along the River Thames.
For a business traveller in London for more than two nights, not sure I would recommend especially if relaxation space and unwinding is important. This hotel has all the basic elements but none of the frills that sometimes you need on a long business trip.
Green Features: Hotel is modern and encourages lowering your carbon footprint.
